title: How to Make an Ocean in a Bottle

steps.headline: Get a small plastic bottle.
steps.description: Make sure that it's fully cleaned or rinsed.

steps.headline: Add food coloring, glitter, small lightweight plastic items, and confetti shaped like your child's favorite animal or shape.
Fill half of the bottle with clear non-toxic oil, such as a light canola oil.
Let your child play with them to their heart's content.

text: Get a small plastic bottle. Make sure that it's fully cleaned or rinsed. Fill half with water.  Add food coloring, glitter, small lightweight plastic items, and confetti shaped like your child's favorite animal or shape.  Fill half of the bottle with clear non-toxic oil, such as a light canola oil.  Recap the bottle tightly.  Let your child play with them to their heart's content.
